name: environment_scenario_get_the_pods_of_a_specific_application_deployed_in
description: Test case for: As a user, I want to get the pods of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

parts.text: get the pods of a specific application deployed in a Cyoda environment.

Which environment and application do you want to get pods for? Please provide:
- Environment name (e.g., `dev`, `staging`, `prod`)
- Application name (exact app namespace/name)

I will first run check_environment_exists() once you provide those values.

[options-single-choice: Provide env & app names, List Environments, Cancel]
